Anyone struggling to access free counselling, who live within or have access to Northampton County Council. ypwn o At the point of this application, the objective is to provide free counselling and therapeutic services to improve the mental health and wellbeing of children, young people and adults, with or without physical or learning disabilities. Phase 2 will see the expansion of these services to the six North London boroughs of Enfield, Haringey, Barnet, Hackney, Islington and Camden. It will also see the expansion to other individuals within those communities (locality) who struggle to access free therapeutic counselling and support
